data.name: UseBiometric
data.value: Use biometric authentication to login into

data.name: SetPinIsteadOfPswd
data.value: Please set a PIN to get access to your wallet. Now it will be used instead of your previous Storage password

data.name: EnterNameLabel
data.value: Please enter a name for your wallet

data.name: MnemonicDescriptionText
data.value: Mnemonic phrase is used to restore your wallet if the data on your device has been lost. Please, write it down and keep it in safe place

data.name: LoseMnemonicPhraseText
data.value: If you lose your mnemonic phrase, your wallet cannot be recovered

data.name: EnterMnemonicPhraseLabel
data.value: Please, enter a mnemonic phrase for your wallet

data.name: DerivedPasswordDescriptionText
data.value: This password can be used for secret key additional protection. To restore a secret key you will need to enter a mnemonic phrase and its password

data.name: MnemonicVerificationDescriptionText
data.value: Please confirm your mnemonic phrase. Click on the words to place them in the correct order

data.name: DerivedVerificationDescriptionText
data.value: Please enter your derived key password

data.name: EnterDerivedPasswordText
data.value: If you used a password to additional protect the secret key, please enter it in the box below. If you enter the wrong password, you will not be able to access your secret key and wallet

data.name: StoragePasswordDescriptionText
data.value: This password is used to protect the stored secret keys and will be needed every time you start your wallet application. Password must not be empty

data.name: ScannerTopOverlayText
data.value: Hold your phone up to the QR code

data.name: SwapInProgressDesc
data.value: Do not close the app until the swap is completed

data.name: SwapCompletedDesc
data.value: You can close Atomex app now

data.name: SwapUnsettledDesc
data.value: You did not have time to redeem the funds, please contact Atomex support

data.name: DappWantsToConnect
data.value: {0} wants to connect to your account

data.name: AppIsRequestingPermissions
data.value: The app is requesting the following permissions

data.name: ConnectToTrustSites
data.value: Only connect to websites you trust

data.name: AreYouSureToDisconnect
data.value: Are you sure you want to disconnect {0}?

data.name: DoYouWantToSignData
data.value: Do you want to sign the following data?

data.name: DeletingWalletText
data.value: Deleting wallet may result in the loss of your funds

data.name: DeletingWalletConfirmationText
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the wallet "{0}"?

data.name: EnableBiometricLabel
data.value: Please enter your password to enable biometric authentication

data.name: DelegationListWillBeUpdated
data.value: Delegation list will be updated after the operation is included in the block

data.name: isNotInWordlist
data.value: is not in the wordlist for this language

data.name: InsufficientChainFunds
data.value: Insufficient {0} to cover token transfer fee

data.name: SufficientNetworkFee
data.value: Sufficient network fee for this amount ({0} is {1})

data.name: TooHighNetworkFee
data.value: Too high network fee for this amount ({0} is {1})

data.name: EmptyWalletName
data.value: Wallet name must be not empty

data.name: WalletAlreadyExists
data.value: Wallet with the same name already exists

data.name: BakerIsDeactivated
data.value: Baker is deactivated. Pick another one

data.name: InsufficientChainFundsWithDetails
data.value: Insufficient {0} to cover token transfer fee. Minimum {1} is required

data.name: SendingTransactionError
data.value: An error has occurred while sending transaction

data.name: DelegationError
data.value: An error has occurred while delegation

data.name: DelegationValidationError
data.value: An error has occurred while delegation validation

data.name: NoTezosError
data.value: You must have more than 0 XTZ

data.name: NoLiquidityError
data.value: Not enough liquidity to convert a specified amount

data.name: PriceChangedError
data.value: Oops, the price has changed during the order sending. Please try again

data.name: TimeoutReachedError
data.value: Atomex is not responding for a long time

data.name: ConversionError
data.value: Conversion error. Please contact technical support

data.name: AvailableFundsError
data.value: The transfer amount (including commission) exceeds the amount of available funds

data.name: CommissionLessThanZeroError
data.value: Commission must be a positive value

data.name: EmptyMnemonicError
data.value: Mnemonic phrase can not be empty

data.name: DelegationLimitWarning
data.value: The selected baker has a minimum delegation limit, which exceeds the balance of your selected wallet

data.name: BakerIsOverdelegatedWarning
data.value: This baker is overdelegated, it will be better to choose another one

data.name: RemoveTxWarning
data.value: Do you confirm the removal from the transaction list? This action affects only the local database and does not affect the blockchain

data.name: ChangingTxFeeWarning
data.value: Warning! Changing fee, gas limit or storage limit can lead to the cancellation of the transaction

data.name: FailedTxParametersWarning
data.value: Warning! Transaction with this parameters is likely to fail

data.name: UpdateApp
data.value: There is a new version of this app available. Would you like to update now?

data.name: NotSupportSecureStorage
data.value: Device doesn't support secure storage on device

data.name: NeedPermissionsForBiometricLogin
data.value: Please enable biometric authentication in the device settings

data.name: ImpossibleEnableBiometric
data.value: It is impossible to enable biometric authentication

data.name: SwapHistoryText
data.value: Swap history is stored locally on your device. This means that you do not see the swap operations that were performed with another device.

data.name: CopyingPrivateKeyWarning
data.value: Copying the private key to the clipboard may result in the loss of all your coins in the wallet. Are you sure you want to copy the private key?

data.name: MinimumAllowedQtyWarning
data.value: The amount must be greater than or equal to the minimum allowed amount {0} {1}

data.name: NotSupportedSymbol
data.value: This symbol does not support direct conversion

data.name: ServicesUnavailable
data.value: Atomex services unavailable. Please check your network connection or contact technical support

data.name: BigAmount
data.value: Amount is greater than the available. Please use the Max button to get the maximum available value

data.name: AmountToFeeRatioToolTip
data.value: The commission does not depend on the conversion amount and is determined only by the current network fees. The larger the convertible amount, the smaller the commission to amount ratio. Atomex blocks the conversion if the commission exceeds 75% of the conversion amount

data.name: MaxAmountToSendRecommendation
data.value: We recommend to send no more than {0} {1}

data.name: MaxAmountToSendRecommendationDetails
data.value: You have tokens that require {1}. Sending this will not leave enough {1} to send or exchange your tokens. We recommend to send no more than {0} {1}

data.name: MaxAmountToSendWithActiveSwaps
data.value: Maximum available amount to send is {0} {1}

data.name: MaxAmountToSendWithActiveSwapsDetails
data.value: You have swaps in process. Your app requires {1} to process them. Safe maximum amount to send is {0} {1}

data.name: OrderMatched
data.value: Swap successfully created. NOTE: Do not sign out or close the application until the swap is completed, otherwise it may result in a loss of funds.

data.name: AvailableAmountDexTooltip
data.value: The limit applies to a single trade. In case you require more liquidity make multiple trades

data.name: AddressIsNotAtomex
data.value: Warning: address {0} is extrenal and is not an Atomex wallet's address. Make sure it's entered correctly

data.name: AddressIsNotAtomexToolTip
data.value: You can receive funds to an extrenal address (eg hardware wallet like Ledger). Using this mechanism make sure that you enter the correct address, because your Atomex wallet will not have access to the private key of the extrenal address and in case of an error access to the funds may be lost

data.name: RedeemFromAddressNote
data.value: Note: the redeem transaction will be sent from the address {0}

data.name: RedeemFromAddressNoteToolTip
data.value: The redeem transaction will be sent from the address {0} if it has enough funds. Otherwise the transaction will be sent by an extrenal service for a fee

data.name: UndelegateWarning
data.value: Are you sure you want to send transaction, that will stop delegating {0} with fee {1} XTZ?

data.name: TryAgainLaterError
data.value: An error occurred. Please try again later

data.name: TooLongToConnect
data.value: If it takes too long to connect

data.name: TestNetWalletWarning
data.value: You are using a test wallet (TestNet), the coins on which have no real monetary value! Be careful and beware of scammers!
